snippet: The discovery of what appears to be the Higgs boson capped one of the most remarkable intellectual adventures in human history.
abstract: Lawrence M Krauss essay explains the real-world importance of the apparent discovery of the Higgs boson by scientists at the Large Hadron Collider; notes that the discovery of the particle paves the way to a deeper understanding of the basic underpinnings of the universe, as well as the unlikely accidents that first brought it into existence.
lead_paragraph: The discovery of what appears to be the Higgs boson capped one of the most remarkable intellectual adventures in human history.

headline.print_headline: A Blip That Speaks of Our Place in the Universe
headline.seo: The Higgs Boson, a Blip That Speaks of Our Place in the Universe
headline.main: A Blip That Speaks of Our Place in the Universe
